summary:
Sacrarium is a Player House based off Dovahkiin Hideout by Shawk. 

Created for those who want a hideout with extravagant looks & the ability to showcase all their trophy items, craft, and plan their next step with access to Vanilla Houses

Read Long Description For Details
descriptionHtml:
Sacrarium is a Player House based off Dovahkiin Hideout by Shawk. 

I made this for other liked minded players who wanted a place to show case everything they\'ve collected in the game from the unique to the mundane. Although Dovahkiin Hideout was a great place for it being a hideout it stayed trued to its roots. I found it lacked the upscale grandoise feeling  that I wanted even though that might not be typical of a hideout. Hence, Enter Sacrarium.

Sacrarium is just the start of something much bigger as this is my first hand at modding anything, however I will be updating it weekly as I have a a lot of plans for it.

Installation:
Extract to Data folder or use nexus mod manager

How to find:
Look for the trap door in BreezeHome Whiterun or any of the Vanilla Player Houses

All comments, criticisms and questions are welcome. I\'m new to this but I try to learn fast.

Features:
 - All Followers Can Enter
 - No In-compatabilites Yet
 - Weekly Updates
***Grand Trophy Hall***
 -16 Mannequins
 -9 Dragon Priest Mask Display (Courtesy of Shawk)
 -8 Display Stands 
 -24 Weapon Racks
 -2 Extra Long Tables w/ seating
 -A Throne (Just for you)
 -Some Furnishings without Clutter (Carpets + Flora) More to come
***Crafting Hall***
 -Many Customized Chests for most different Item Categories (Will take requests)
 -Full Crafting Station (Alchemy, Cooking, Enchanting, Smelter, Smithy, Tannery, Work Bench, Wood Chopping Block)
***Main Hall***
 -Doors to Vanilla Player Homes + Winterhold & Ragged Flagon (Courtesy of Shawk) Can only be unlocked once you have bought said homes.
 -1st of a Number of NPCs (Sells Wares that are level specific and limited in stock but open 24 hours)

Current:
Version 0.1.2
 - Added Key For RaggedFlagon Teleport/Trapdoor in Honeyside Home; look for a chest (Solves issue of some NPCs unlocking master skill door)
 - Added Key For Winterhold Teleport/Trapdoor in Master Quarters; look for a chest (Just a security measure for compatibility) 


Previous:
Version 0.1.1
 - 8 Display Stands *Updated Missing Stand*
 - NavMesh in BreezeHome *Updated*

Version 0.1
 - Oldest Version

Troubleshooting:
1. Having Issues finding the file?
- File Name: aacell.esp (Not sure how to change this as I started out with a tutorial using this name and it stuck without realizing)
2. Is this compatible with UFO?
- Yes it is just make sure UFO is loaded after aacell.esp

To Do:
-Library (W/ Enough shelves for every book)
-Bed Rooms
-Vault Room
-Garden for Flora
-Mine Shaft
-Multiple NPC
-Underground Lake
-Bar
-Shrines
-DarkBrotherHood Teleport
-Arena 
-Dungeon
-Updates for Trophy Hall, Crafting Hall and Main Hall

Uninstall/Update
- Replace Old file with New or Let Nexus Mod Manager Fix it
author: NemesisSkyrim
